product_name: Bodyglide Pocket-Size Anti-Chafe Formula - Package of 3
long_description: Carry Bodyglide pocket-size anti-chafing skin protectant with you wherever you go. It creates an invisible barrier on your skin to prevent blisters and chafing. Pocket-size sticks of Bodyglide are easy to take along on any trip. All natural formula is fragrance-free, petroleum-free, hypoallergenic, water- and sweat-resistant, nongreasy and non-staining. Easily glides on like a solid deodorant so there's no mess or handwashing necessary after applying. Bodyglide pocket-size anti-chafing skin protectant contains aloe vera and vitamin E to moisturize skin. Package of 3.
short_description: Carry Bodyglide pocket-size anti-chafing skin protectant with you wherever you go. It creates an invisible barrier on your skin to prevent blisters and chafing.
